name: Los juegos del Coco
description:
Los juegos del coco is an artistic project that was exposed in two galleriesin colombia, i am currently working on a more game/like interactive experience but wanted to shared these two simple games with the ccommunity - you are a grandma trying to avoid the floor of getting to hot, use arrows to move and left ctrl to throw water.- you are an accordion player, that is in danger of getting eaten by an aligator use the arrow keys to play the accordeon(pretty much like guitar hero)
(both of those things could totally happen in the colombian caribbean region)
